reviews.text:
El Saler Shopping Center is a vibrant retail hub in Valencia, featuring a diverse range of shops, restaurants, and entertainment options. With its modern architecture and spacious layout, it provides a lively atmosphere for shopping and leisure, making it a popular destination for both locals and visitors.

28/10/2024 - Update after company reply:
First of all, it seems your perception about reviews is a bit mistaken. Reviews are not a request for assistance and don't require an answer. Reviews are just an opinion about the company.
Furthermore, who said to you that my review was not written by a customer? And if it was really not written by a customer, what's the point? It's the most ridiculous reply I ever got. I'm praising the company and they come to question my review with unfounded claims.

Nice shopping mall with a good choice of shops and restaurants to any taste. Clean, well organised. There is free wifi. The toilets have contemporary design and are very clean. Free parking after 14.00

A place in which you can find everything you want.
They have a big Carrefour for all your groceries & day to day items. Big selection of brands, clothes, dining, jewellery & all what you wish for.
It stays open until about 2200 while the restaurant section until midnight.
I was happy during my stay at Valencia to be close to this mall as I used it for my daily needs

One of the best shopping malls in Valencia. Beautiful architecture, good stores, plenty of restaurants as well as plenty of seating options. I'd definitely recommend paying a visit and outside you can get some Churros ;-D
this was our go-to place to eat because it's near to NH hotel.. it was clean, beautiful and have variety of shops to choose from! but some shops are closed on Sundays.
